item.title: Quick question, quick answer
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

make a getCLAgility or under process add if(playerLevel[#] <= 49 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You Need 50 Agility To Wield This Weapon!"); }

change the first # to the skill number that agility is and the next set of #'s to the id of the item

the 1 is telling it that if the name doesn’t start with any of the defined names to return a level of 1
